tldr: Affected versions of this package improperly sanitize multipart form field names, allowing specially crafted keys (e.g., `__proto__` or `constructor.prototype`) to modify object prototypes during form parsing, leading to prototype pollution. An attacker can exploit this by submitting a malicious multipart request with crafted field names that inject properties into `Object.prototype`, potentially altering application logic, bypassing security controls, or causing denial of service depending on how polluted objects are used.
doest_this_affect_me: You are affected if you are using a version that falls within the vulnerable range.
how_to_fix: Upgrade the `@adonisjs/bodyparser` library to the patch version.
